code: @Override public void writeTo(StreamOutput out) throws IOException {     super.writeTo(out).     out.writeString(reason). }
@Override public boolean match(Task task) {     return super.match(task) && task instanceof CancellableTask. }

comment: /**  * Set the reason for canceling the task.  */
code: /**  * Set the reason for canceling the task.  */ public CancelTasksRequest setReason(String reason) {     this.reason = reason.     return this. }

comment: /**  * The reason for canceling the task.  */
code: /**  * The reason for canceling the task.  */ public String getReason() {     return reason. }
